SceneDescription.name: Dining Room - 1F
SceneDescription.description:
Assassin: "Stop right now!"
Maid: "Huh? What do you want?"
Assassin: "Please don’t dump that wine on the tablecloth."
Maid: "What? Why?"
Assassin: [Because I don’t want to clean that shit up...]
Assassin: It’s not worth it.
Maid: "Yes it is! Lord Borkus is jerk! We’ll show him how important we are!"
Assassin: [I have to negotiate this somehow.]
